description: Number of partitions in expanding space: sigma(n,q) is the sum of the q-th powers of the divisors of n.
formula: G.f.: exp( Sum_{k>0} sigma_k(k) * x^k / k). - _Michael Somos_, Feb 15 2006G.f.: Product_{n>=1} (1 - n^n*x^n)^(-1/n). - Paul D. Hanna, Mar 08 2011
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, polcoeff( exp( sum( k=1, n, sigma(k, k) * x^k / k, x * O(x^n))), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 15 2006 */(PARI) {a(n)=if(n<0,0,polcoeff(prod(k=1,n,(1-k^k*x^k+x*O(x^n))^(-1/k)),n))} /* Paul D. Hanna */
